snippet.title: Battle Moon Wars -Perfect Edition- Trailer
snippet.description:
This trailer is pretty much the reason why the BMW videos are on hold. This is what I'm planning to do
Include battle animation that were graphically updated (unles they were really minor, check out Nanaya's new instant jail is what ill upload)
Not going to do Saber's slightly different Excalibur animation
Doing Saber Lily and Magical Girl Amber and whatever characters added
Adding Original Takumi and Haruna animations as well.
Nanaya's Instant Jail I believe is looking badass here.
Lawl, Nirvash + P4 reference combined with fanservice.
